## GPT Privacy Policy

Effective Date: 4/4/24

  
This privacy policy outlines our practices regarding the collection, use, and
disclosure of information when you use our GPT-based service.

Our service is
designed to provide information in response to user queries without collecting
any personal information, and to facilitate functions without compromising
your privacy.

Data Handling  
No Personal Data Collection for Basic Queries: Our GPT action does not collect
any personal information from its users.

Account Creation for Extended Features: For some features, users are required
to create an account.

While the GPT will only access non-personal data for
these features, the account creation process and any associated data will be
subject to our regular privacy policy, which can be found at
<https://www.capchair.com/privacy.>  
Queries: We only process the text of the queries submitted by users.

No
additional data is recorded or stored except for what is necessary for
functionality that requires account creation for users who opt into these
features by creating an account.

## GPT Privacy Policy

Effective Date: 4/4/24

  
This privacy policy outlines our practices regarding the collection, use, and
disclosure of information when you use our GPT-based service.

Data Sharing and Disclosure  
No Data Sharing: As we do not collect personal data, there is no sharing or
disclosing of any personal information to third parties.
